name: Geo Teo!!!
description:
Oh no the cristals have been stoled by King Revo Emag You Should found them before gets late

HOW TO PLAY:

ARROWS:move GT

SPACE:makes GT jump

REQUIEREMENTS:

WINDOWS: 7/8/10 64 bits

GFX:Intel Ingrated Graphics 4500

RAM: 4 GB

SCREEN RES: any, but for better sprites;MORE THAN 1280x720

requirements in a nutshell:

if your pc luckly runs PJ64 you can play Geo Teo!!

NOTE:if you dont see the desktop EXE go to C:\Users\(YOUR USER)\AppData\Local\Programs
